rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0002_2
rows.name:
I have no idea what material
the purple frame part is made of, and[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0003
rows.name: I can't find anything that looks like a power source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Isn't it like a statue worshipped by aliens
or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0005
rows.name:
What about a cockpit?
Is there nothing like that either?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Since there's a cavity in the center of the chest, maybe there[ST:wide ]―
that is, if a person rides and operates it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, given that it was abandoned in a place like that,
whether you can really call this a weapon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0008
rows.name:
But didn't they say Growth kept persistently
sending recovery teams?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0009
rows.name: There must be something special about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0010
rows.name:
That's logical.
But if we don't understand it, we can't do anything with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0011
rows.name: No point asking the impossible of Lin-kun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0012
rows.name:
In that case, doesn't the Ares you brought
have more worth investigating?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06120100_MSG0012_3
rows.name:
Ah, you don't remember, do you?
The Ares is, Elma[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]
